name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: Though #BuildBackBetter Act isn’t everything I wanted, it’s an important investment in our nation, one that will pay dividends for generations. I am proud to vote to pass it and urge the Senate to pass it quickly. We must get this done for the American people.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: I’m deeply humbled that my legislation will play a key role in our nation’s effort to address the threat of climate change.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: The #BuildBackBetter Act tackles climate change. It includes my GREEN Act, which uses the tax code to increase the use of renewable energy, reducing greenhouse gas emissions enough to meet @POTUS’s long-term emissions goals.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: It makes health insurance more affordable, supports cities and towns, cuts taxes for homeowners, reduces prescription costs and includes parts of my Disaster Tax Relief Act to incentivize investments in disaster resiliency.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: The #BuildBackBetter Act also helps families get back into the workforce.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: In fact, the #ChildTaxCredit has already helped to cut child poverty in half.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: For workers and families, #BuildBackBetter Act provides paid family leave, universal pre-K education for three- and four-year-olds and another year of expanded Child Tax Credit, a tax cut for working families. These programs invest in our children.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: THREAD: Today I voted for one of the most consequential bills of my time in Congress, @POTUS’s #BuildBackBetter Act. It makes an historic investment in workers, families and communities and includes the most ambitious climate policies ever passed, my GREEN Act. IT IS PAID FOR.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: I was proud to witness the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act become law and will work to ensure our district and our state can access these critical investments in the years to come.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: The investments we are making today build an infrastructure for the next generation, one that funds our road, bridges and highways, but one that also funds our future.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: This includes a network for electric vehicle chargers, zero emission school busses and funding to research the next generation of clean energy technology.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: The bill is an important step forward in our work to combat climate change. It includes $21 billion to protect our nation’s environment and more than $73 billion to invest in clean energy infrastructure across our county.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: The Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act also provides funds for our state to invest $100 million in expanding broadband in rural and underserved areas.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: Importantly, California will receive an $84 million investment to help mitigate the impact of future fires, including money for forest management projects and funding so homeowners can better fireproof their homes.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: The bill, which I voted to pass earlier this month, provides $25.3 billion for highways, $4.2 billion for bridges, and $9.45 billion for transit projects in California. This important funding will be spent in our district to address our local infrastructure and create jobs.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: We must continue our peaceful protests as we work toward justice and equality for all Black Americans and people of color facing racism and discrimination day in and day out. We can and must build a better nation together.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: Together as a community, let us pray for George Floyd’s family and loved ones as they continue to mourn his loss.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: No one is above the law and we must work to ensure full equality for all.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: As we mark this verdict, may we also recommit to the work that must be done to fix the historic and systemic racism that led to George’s death and the unwarranted deaths of many Black Americans and people of color.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: And I hope that this measure of accountability for his tragic death can help our nation heal.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: THREAD: Though nothing can bring back George Floyd, I hope that today’s guilty verdict can bring his family and friends some peace.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: This cannot be our last steps as more action is still needed. I remain firm in my work to ensure the Senate holds a vote on #HR8, my bipartisan bill to expand background checks and save lives. Our work must continue.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: Finally, @POTUS announced his intention to nominate David Chipman to lead the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives. David has been a steadfast leader on gun violence prevention with decades of experience in law enforcement and I was proud to support his nomination.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: He also announced that the Department of Justice will do an annual report on firearm trafficking and support more evidence-based community violence intervention programs, important moves that the Task Force also requested.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: These actions will better regulate ghost guns which increasingly are being used in gun violence incidents and concealable rifles like the gun used in the Boulder mass shooting. These are actions I have led @HouseGVP Task Force in asking him to take.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
tweet_text: Our local small businesses that are at the heart of our economy will receive additional assistance to the hardest hit businesses. And our state and local governments that are at the tip of the spear will get the help they need to fight the pandemic and provide relief to people.

name: Rep. Mike Thompson

name: Rep. Mike Thompson
